structure.unit: Administrative Provisions Relative To State Taxation

law.catch_line: Failure To Possess License Or Registration As Required By Secs. 67 And 67 A; Penalty
law.text: Any person who conducts any business in the commonwealth for which a registration or license issued pursuant to section sixty-seven or sixty-seven A is required and who is not in possession of such registration or license shall be punished by a fine of not less than two hundred dollars nor more than five hundred dollars. The superior court may on petition of the commissioner restrain such person from doing business in the commonwealth without such registration or license.
